EmailTemplate.name: Youth Board 1st Meeting Invite WF,H&E New
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to your next Youth Board meeting!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope you were able to attend Ignite last month, but don't worry if not! We'd like to invite you to your first Youth Board meeting in your new borough cluster, where you will able to meeting the other members of your elite team for the rest of the year!
Waltham Forest, Haringey & Enfield Youth Board:
Your first meeting will be from 5pm - 7pm on Tuesday 15th December at
639 Enterprise Centre, 639 High Rd, London, N17 8AA
This will be a great chance to get to know each other properly, find out what the rest of year will look like, understand further what the Youth Board role involves and have a look back at the recent Ignite event.
Please email rahul.malde@the-challenge.org to confirm whether or not you can attend the session.
We're looking forward to seeing you there!
The Challenge Society
